name: The Aspasia Phuket

reviews.title: Top Marks for the Aspasia
reviews.text: We had the pleasure of spending 2 Nights in a Far Eastern suite at the Aspasia in May . This is essentially a joining of the smaller cicada chorus room and larger Ocean Gallery Suite to form one Enourmous (210m2) and very luxurious suite which would have slept four . We chose to pay (£10 extra per night) for the 2 units in case of nose heard through the adjoining door . The adjoining doors were very heavy and soundproofed but you would still hear some noise from your neighbours ,so take heed if you value your peace and quiet !

reviews.title: Beautiful high quality furnishings
reviews.text: The suite consisted of two very large bedrooms of similar size ,the master suite having a large circular Jacuzzi bath which was perfect to cool off after being out in the humidity of Phuket and a large central living and kitchen diner area with additional third toilet !.The overall design is modern and minimal. One small criticism was that the TV's were placed in the bedrooms so you could not watch TV from the living area. Outside was a large terrace with fantastic sea views .They have also made a very good job of disguising the roofs of the other units with planting and water .

aka: The Aspasia Phuket Hotel Kata Beach
description: Recently created in the south of the island of Phuket, The Aspasia is a stylish boutique resort reflecting an unusual retro-deco design with hints of Mayan style architecture. The muted yellow and green hues of the buildings blend exotically with the colours of the lush forest that sweeps down to Kata Beach. Each secluded apartment has stunning sea views, and guests only have a two minute walk to the white, sandy beach below.With the accent firmly lying on tranquility, comfort and contemporary style, The Aspasia Phuket offers a choice of superior accommodation and facilities that includes restaurant, a wine and cigar shop, two swimming pools, a gymnasium, business centre, meeting room, high-speed wireless Internet access and spa. Original paintings and antiques are displayed in the spa, restaurant and lobby, complementing the style of decor. There is easy access between the twelve buildings and facilities forming the resort. The property is set amongst beautifully landscaped gardens, filled with colourful tropical planting.
